AI Prompt Engineering Syllabus

4 weeks (16 hours)
Intermediate
Certificate of Completion

Master the art of crafting effective prompts to get the most out of your AI automation.

Instructor

MC

Michael Chen

AI Prompt Specialist, Air Force Veteran

Learning Objectives

  • Understand how language models interpret and respond to prompts
  • Craft clear, specific prompts that generate desired outputs
  • Apply prompt engineering techniques for different use cases
  • Implement prompt templates for consistent results
  • Debug and refine prompts to improve AI responses
  • Create prompt libraries for business applications
  • Integrate effective prompts into MCP automation workflows

Prerequisites

  • Basic understanding of AI and language models
  • Familiarity with MCP servers (MCP Server Fundamentals course recommended)
  • Experience using AI tools like ChatGPT or Claude

Course Modules

Module 1: Foundations of Prompt Engineering

Understanding how AI models interpret prompts

1.1 How Language Models Work

The inner workings of large language models

Video • 25 minutes

1.2 The Anatomy of an Effective Prompt

Key components that make prompts successful

Video • 30 minutes

1.3 Common Prompt Engineering Mistakes

Pitfalls to avoid when crafting prompts

Video • 20 minutes

1.4 Hands-on: Prompt Analysis

Analyze and evaluate different prompts and their outputs

Exercise • 45 minutes

1.5 Module 1 Quiz

Test your understanding of prompt engineering basics

Quiz

Module 2: Prompt Engineering Techniques

Advanced methods for crafting effective prompts

2.1 Zero-shot and Few-shot Prompting

Using examples to guide AI responses

Video • 25 minutes

2.2 Chain-of-Thought Prompting

Guiding AI through complex reasoning steps

Video • 30 minutes

2.3 Role-based Prompting

Assigning specific roles to improve AI responses

Video • 25 minutes

2.4 System and User Instructions

Using different instruction types effectively

Video • 20 minutes

2.5 Hands-on: Applying Advanced Techniques

Practice applying different prompting techniques

Exercise • 60 minutes

Module 3: Domain-Specific Prompt Engineering

Tailoring prompts for specific use cases

3.1 Prompts for Content Creation

Crafting prompts for generating marketing and creative content

Video • 25 minutes

3.2 Prompts for Data Analysis

Using AI to analyze and interpret data

Video • 30 minutes

3.3 Prompts for Customer Service

Creating effective customer service automation

Video • 25 minutes

3.4 Prompts for Code Generation

Getting AI to write and debug code

Video • 30 minutes

3.5 Hands-on: Domain-Specific Prompting

Create prompts for different business domains

Exercise • 60 minutes

Module 4: Prompt Management and Integration

Implementing prompt engineering in production

4.1 Creating Prompt Templates

Building reusable prompt templates

Video • 25 minutes

4.2 Prompt Libraries and Version Control

Managing prompts across teams and projects

Video • 20 minutes

4.3 Integrating Prompts with MCP

Using engineered prompts in MCP automation workflows

Video • 30 minutes

4.4 Measuring Prompt Effectiveness

Metrics and methods for evaluating prompts

Video • 25 minutes

4.5 Final Project: Prompt Engineering for Business

Create a comprehensive prompt library for a business case

Project • 90 minutes

Assessment Methods

Module Quiz

Quiz testing your understanding of prompt engineering concepts

20%

Prompt Analysis Assignments

Analyze and improve existing prompts for better results

30%

Domain-Specific Prompt Creation

Create effective prompts for specific business domains

20%

Final Project

Develop a comprehensive prompt library for a business case

30%
